autoscan: 20 auto scan tracks, user-defined left and right boundaries and scan speed
cameracontrol: Pan/Tilt, Zoom, Focus, Click centering, Zoom by mouse dragging, Iris, preset calling and programming, auto mode
imagecompression: H.264/MPEG4, H.264 encoding with Baseline/Main/High profile
pantiltspeed: Pan Manual Speed: 0.1° ~ 360° /s, Pan Preset Speed: 360° /s
lens: Focal Length4.7 ~ 84mm, 18x Optical zoom + 12x digital zoom
webbrowser: IE 7, IE 8, IE 9, Chrome 8+, Firefox 3.5+, Safari 5+, support multi-language

protocols: IPv4/IPv6, HTTP, HTTPS, 802.1x, Qos, FTP, SMTP, UPnP, SNMP, DNS, DDNS, NTP, RTSP, RTP, TCP/IP, UDP, IGMP, ICMP, DHCP, PPPoE
